app.name: Analytics Dashboard
app.tagline: Real-time business intelligence and data visualization
app.description: A powerful analytics platform that transforms your data into actionable insights. Create custom dashboards, visualize trends, and make data-driven decisions with ease.
app.longDescription:
Analytics Dashboard is a comprehensive business intelligence solution that helps organizations make sense of their data. With powerful visualization tools, real-time updates, and customizable dashboards, you can monitor key metrics, identify trends, and share insights across your team.

Key Features:
- Interactive charts and graphs
- Real-time data updates
- Custom dashboard builder
- Data source integrations
- Scheduled reports and alerts
- Team collaboration and sharing
- Export and presentation modes
- Mobile-optimized views
- Advanced filtering and drill-down
- AI-powered insights and anomaly detection
features: Export to PDF, Excel, and images
